about_the_game:
Forge Your Legend in the Underworld!

Embark on an epic quest to reclaim the legendary Hellsting, a sword of immense power stolen from your kingdom. Join forces with a mysterious witch girl and journey through a dark and perilous world filled with mythical creatures and ancient ruins.

Features:

Rich Storyline: Unravel a captivating narrative filled with twists, turns, and moral dilemmas.

Forge Powerful Weapons: Craft legendary weapons and armor to aid you in your quest.

Discover the secrets behind the theft of the Hellsting and the sinister forces that seek to use its power for evil.

Master Swordsmanship: Learn to wield the swords that are made of Hellsting and unleash its devastating power against your foes.

Explore a Vast World: Traverse diverse landscapes, from lush forests to treacherous dungeons, and encounter a variety of creatures and challenges.

Strategic Combat: Engage in intense, tactical battles against hordes of enemies, utilizing a combination of swordplay, magic, and stealth.

Forge Alliances: Build relationships with unique characters, each with their own stories and motivations.

Can you reclaim the Hellsting and restore honor to your kingdom?

name: Hellsting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 180 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 - AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 - AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

short_description: Prepare to wield the arcane arts to rise through the ranks of the underworld. Explore treacherous plains, mountains, forests, mines, caves, dungeons, battle fearsome demons, and craft your own legend in a fantasy land. With its unusual storyline, Hellsting offers an unforgettable gaming experience.
